list.listitem: Amalthea (mythology), the foster-mother of Zeus in Greek mythology.
Cumaean SibylAmaltheia, alternative name of theCumaean Sibyl
Amalthea Cellars, a winery in New Jersey
113 Amalthea, an asteroid in the (main) asteroid belt.
Amalthea, a ship bombed by the communistAnton Nilsonin Malm, Sweden in 1908.

Amalthea (band), a Swedish postrock/post-metal band from Gothenburg, Sweden.
